籤詩版本二:
Ukungena nokuphuma enkampini ukuya kufuna impumelelo enkulu, njengejeyidi engenasiphako efihlwe elityeni
Ukuba unomntu obekekileyo wokukukhokela, uya kusikelelwa ngobuncwane kunye nembonakalo entle ngeli xesha.
詩意:
Eli litye le-hexagram limele ubuncwane obufihlwe kuyo.
Yonke into ihamba kakuhle.
解曰: Njengelitye elifihla i-jade. Imiyalelo yesidwangube iyanelisa. Ndiyavuya kwaye ndinebhongo.
籤詩故事一:
◇ UMlawuli uYang wajonga eQionghua
I-viburnum iqhakaza kanye ngonyaka, kwaye ngokuhlwa. U-Emperor Yang we-Sui Dynasty weva umntu esithi intyatyambo yaseQionghua yaseYangzhou ayinakulinganiswa nanto ehlabathini, imhlophe njengejeyidi, intle, ithambile kwaye inobuhle. Ukuthatha ishweshwe lasebukhosini kwisikhephe sedragoni, baya eYangzhou ukuya konwabela iintyatyambo, ezazizele bubuyokoyoko kunye nobumnandi, kunye neeflegi zibhabha.
(Isikweko seli bali sesokuba izinto zixabisekile njengale "Qionghua". Ukuba ayiveli, ayizukuba yinto. Ukuba ithe yenzeka, iya kukumangalisa.)
聖意: Indlu iyathandeka, umntu uyaphumelela, ukuthengiselana kuyaphumelela, umtshato uyaphumelela, indoda izalelwe eLiujia, umhambi ngeenyawo uyashukunyiswa, umbungu wesilika uyashukunyiswa, umbungu wesilika ugxile kwizilwanyana ezithandathu, ulawulo olukhutheleyo luyalandelwa. , ityala liphumelele, impahla elahlekileyo ilungile, isifo yi-Anshan, ingcwaba lihle.
